summary: Frontend testing completed for MegaRadio React Native Expo app. All critical bug fixes verified: 1) Audio playback atomicity working - singleton AudioManager properly stops existing stream before playing new one, 2) Car Mode carousel shows different station logos at different positions (verified 3 unique logos), 3) SafeAreaView properly implemented with edges=['top', 'bottom'], 4) Station single-click to play working correctly.

issues: Carousel renders with large white background on web - this is expected as the component is designed for React Native mobile. Native mobile testing on Expo Go is recommended.
